OOC: Why, thank you. However, there were some MAJOR holes there, so I 
had it taken down and I modified it. Turns out the Chivs are in the 
Rockies. I'm not even going to guess how an elephant could get there. 
Just not realistic, yes? So I'm going to post the modified version me 
and Mr. Rauq (THANK GOD FOR HIM!) came up with. I'll be there to help 
out the Chivi's in no time flat... couple of posts.
